member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO
member.summary: The namespace is an enumerator containing classes and members for using SQL Server Management Objects (SMO). You can select what information to enumerate over, and how that information is enumerated.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.EmptyEnumerator
member.summary: Acts as a placeholder when enumeration is called on an empty collection. The runtime returns the empty enumerator when there are no elements in the collection to enumerate over. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.EmptyEnumerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.EmptyEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection. Returns false if there is no object to move to.
member.returns: false, because there is no item to move to in the empty collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.EmptyEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.EmptyEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Raises an error indicating an empty enumerator.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator
member.summary: Contains the members used when enumerating over SQL Management Objects (SMO). This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.GetEnumerator(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging)
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the instance.
member.returns: An object that is subsequently cast to an IEnumerator object.
member.param: An object that implements the interface.
An object that implements the interface.
A collection of connections used by the SMO enumerator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.LoadFromXML(System.Xml.XmlElement,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: Loads an object from XML.
member.param: The node that contains the object or data to be loaded and persisted.
An object that implements the for raising events (errors, warnings, and so on) during persistence.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.SaveToXML(System.Xml.XmlDocument,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: Saves an object to XML. It is recommended that any changes to the package be saved by using .
member.param: The XML document to which to save the information.
An object that implements the interface for raising events (errors, warnings, and so on) during persistence.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.Validate(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the container has invalid settings that will prevent it from running successfully.
member.returns: A enumeration that indicates the outcome of the validation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.ForEachSMOEnumerator.EnumURN
member.summary: Gets or sets a String that contains the SMO enumeration Uniform Resource Name (URN) for the selected enumeration.
member.returns: A String that contains the enumerator's configuration parameters.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.IDTSForEachSMOEnumerator
member.summary: Defines the interface for the class, providing members to enumerate over SQL Management Objects (SMO)..

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.IDTSForEachSMOEnumerator.EnumURN
member.summary: Gets or sets a String that contains the SQL Management Object (SMO) enumeration Uniform Resource Name (URN) for the selected enumeration.
member.returns: A String that contains the enumerator's configuration parameters.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMODataFileEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates the SQL Management Objects (SMO) data file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMODataFileEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.
member.returns: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMODataFileEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMODataFileEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current object from the enumerator.
member.returns: An object that is the current object in the collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMOEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates the SQL Management Objects (SMO) objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMOEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.
member.returns: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMOEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.SMO.SMOEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current object from the enumerator.
member.returns: An object that is the current object in the collection.
